doctor.name: Dr. Abdullah Al Mahmood
doctor.info: Dr. Abdullah Al Mahmood is a Liver Specialist in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Hepatology). He is a Associate Professor (Hepatology) at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at CSCR Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Abdullah Al Mahmood at CSCR Hospital, Chittagong is 6pm to 10pm (Sun, Tue & Thursday).
